insert into t_parklot (parklotId, parklotNum, parkCentificateNum, parklotOwer, owerTel, parklotValue, boughtPrice, parklotType, boughtDate, parklotStatus, carparkId) values (#{parklotid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkcentificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parklotower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parklotvalue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{boughtprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parklottype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{boughtdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{parklotstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_parklot set parklotNum = #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parkCentificateNum = #{parkcentificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parklotOwer = #{parklotower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owerTel = #{owertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parklotValue = #{parklotvalue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, boughtPrice = #{boughtprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, parklotType = #{parklottype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, boughtDate = #{boughtdate,jdbcType=DATE}, parklotStatus = #{parklotstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carparkId = #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where parklotId = #{parklotid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select parklotId, parklotNum, parkCentificateNum, parklotOwer, owerTel, parklotValue, boughtPrice, parklotType, boughtDate, parklotStatus, carparkId from t_parklot where parklotId = #{parklotid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
